title.narrative: Nigeria - Kaduna State Economic Transformation Program-for-Results

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to improve the business enabling environment and strengthen fiscal management and accountability in Kaduna State.

participating-org.narrative: Kaduna State Ministry of Budget and Planning

title.narrative: 1. Simplified business processes: reduction in the time required to start a business, deal with construction permit and register property (DLI1)
Implemented reforms supporting private sector development
Improvement of tax collection: registered taxpayers (TIN) filing tax returns (DLI 7)
Increased procurement effectiveness: main procuring MDAs implementing e-procurement, disclosing information on contract awards and conducting procurement audits (DLI 9)
3. Increased fiscal accountability, measured by improved government responsiveness to citizens’ feedback on fiscal performance: indicated by the percentage of capital projects improved (DLI 10)
Timely payment of contractors by public entities: arrears of payment to contractors as percentage of appropriation
Enhanced strategic planning and budgeting of public investment: MDAs whose budgeted capital expenditure are aligned with Sector Implementation Plans (SIP)
2. Increased budget credibility: IGR outturn and capital expenditure execution rate, in percentage (DLI 6 & 8)
Improving performance information on service delivery: sector programs evaluated after three years of implementation
Compliance of large (over 250 employees) private and public corporate entities with Personal Income Tax Administration (PAYE) system
Development of the legal and institutional framework for PPP (DLI 4)

target.value: PPF governance, FCCL framework, and PPP disclosure framework completed.

actual.value: PPP policy and PPP manual complete. Rest of legal and institutional framework ongoing

title.narrative: Increased fiscal transparency of State and Local Governments (LG): disclosure of state and LG appropriations and budget execution audit reports

baseline.value: LG budgets disclosed for first time in 2016; audit report of LG budget execution not disclosed.

target.value: Timely disclosure of state and LG budgets and audit reports of state and LG budget execution.

actual.value: Audit report for 2019 and 2020 budgets disclosed in July 2020 and September 2021

title.narrative: Development and implementation of a Framework for Responsible and Inclusive Land-Intensive Agricultural Investments (DLI 5)

target.value: FRILIA adopted through a legal instrument

actual.value: FRILIA has been adopted. Law passed and endorsed October 15, 2021.

title.narrative: Implementation of systematic property registration program: new Certificates of Occupancy (CofOs) issued (DLI 2)
Strengthening investment promotion: Memoranda of Understanding signed between investors and KADIPA (DLI 3)
Investors that reach operations stage or aftercare in Kaduna State with KADIPA facilitation
